name: exsimpr
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w1)

comment: Simplification of an existentially quantified conjunction. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 25-Sep-2010.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)
